name: Nibble some berries
snippet: You've landed on a branch and have found some berries. Click to eat.

name: Find the worm
snippet: Find the worm in one of these boxes, you've two changes before he escapes. Click to choose.

name: Eat from the feeder
snippet: There's lots of yummy seeds to eat in here. Click to see how fast you can eat them.

name: Eat all the bugs
snippet: Gobble up all the bugs wondering about, click to nom
